description:
SMOOTH PARCELS IN A VOLUME SEPARATELY.

The volume is smoothed within each label in the label volume using data only from within the label.  Equivalent to running volume smoothing with ROIs matching each label separately, then adding the resulting volumes, but faster.

fwhm.description: smoothing kernel size is FWHM, not sigma

fix-zeros.description: treat zero values as not being data

subvol.description:
select a single subvolume to smooth

the subvolume number or name

label-volume.description: a label volume containing the parcels to smooth

kernel.description: the size of the gaussian smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default
